summary: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.
cast: Catherine Deneuve|Jean Sorel|Michel Piccoli|Geneviève Page|Pierre Clémenti|Françoise Fabian|Macha Méril|Muni|Maria Latour|Claude Cerval|Michel Charrel|Iska Khan|Bernard Musson|Marcel Charvey|François Maistre|Francisco Rabal|Georges Marchal|Francis Blanche|Adélaïde Blasquez|Stéphane Bouy|Luis Buñuel|Dominique Dandrieux|Albert Daumergue|Debut de Roseville|Marc Eyraud|Bernard Fresson|Pierre Marcay|Brigitte Parmentier|Antonio Passalia|Claude Salez|Dominique Sauvage|Pierre Vaudier
title: Belle de jour (Bella de día)
